## Tabela i wykres

| Imiona       | wiek |
|--------------|------|
| Sung Jinwoo  |   24 |
| Sung Jinah   |   16 |
| Cha Hae-In   |   22 |


```{r}
library(ggplot2)

# Dane
df <- data.frame(
  postac = c("Sung Jinwoo", "Sung Jinah", "Cha Hae-In"),
  wiek = c(24, 16, 22 )
)

# Wykres
ggplot(df, aes(x = postac, y = wiek)) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
    "Sung Jinwoo" = "#41106E",
    "Sung Jinah"  = "#2D7AAD",
    "Cha Hae-In"  = "#66160A"
  )) +
  labs(
    title = "Wiek postaci",
    x = "Postać",
    y = "Wiek"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
